text: Events from the year 1999 in Russia. ==Incumbents== *President: Boris Yeltsin (until 31 December), Vladimir Putin *Prime Minister: ** until 12 May: Yevgeny Maximovich Primakov ** 12 May-9 August: Sergei Stepashin ** starting 9 August: Vladimir Putin *Minister of Defence: Igor Sergeyev ==Events== ===March=== *19 March - 1999 Vladikavkaz bombing ===June=== *June - Exercise Zapad-99 ===August=== *August - Invasion of Dagestan ===September=== *September - Russian apartment bombings ===October=== *7 October - Elistanzhi cluster bomb attack *21 October - Grozny ballistic missile attack *29 October - Baku–Rostov highway bombing ===December=== *December - Alkhan-Yurt massacre *3 December - 1999 Grozny refugee convoy shooting *19 December - 1999 Russian legislative election ==Deaths== *12 June - Sergey Khlebnikov, Olympic speed skater (b. 1955) *3 July - Igor Belsky, ballet dancer (b. 1925) *28 July - Georgy Rerberg, cinematographer (b. 1937) *7 October - Genrikh Sapgir, writer (b. 1928) *21 December - Sergey Nagovitsyn, singer (b. 1968) ==References== ==External links== Category:1990s in Russia Category:Years of the 20th century in Russia Russia Russia Russia
title: 1999 in Russia
